name: Candidate Background Screening
description: Research candidate background, verify credentials, check public records, compile screening report
_compliance_warning: ⚠️ HIGH-RISK PLAYBOOK: This playbook processes personal data and affects employment decisions. Requires: (1) Candidate consent, (2) FCRA compliance for U.S., (3) GDPR lawful basis for EU, (4) Human attestation before use, (5) Audit trail retention.

complianceBoundaries.lawfulBasis: Consent - Candidate has provided explicit consent for background screening as part of employment application
complianceBoundaries.retentionPolicy: Compliance with FCRA/GDPR - check local regulations

evidenceRequirements.description: Proof of candidate consent for background check
Final screening report for hiring manager

attestations.prompt: I attest that candidate consent has been obtained and documented per FCRA/GDPR requirements
I attest that I have lawful basis to conduct this background screening
I attest that only approved and lawful public record sources will be used

steps.instruction: Navigate to LinkedIn profile ${LINKEDIN_URL} and verify: employment history, education, skills, recommendations
Navigate to listed universities and verify degree/attendance if public records available
Check relevant professional licensing boards for active licenses (if applicable to ${POSITION})
Search public court records databases for ${CANDIDATE_NAME} (criminal, civil cases)
Review publicly available social media for professionalism red flags (public posts only, no login)
Analyze employment history timeline for gaps > 6 months
Generate screening report: verification summary, flags/concerns, recommendation (proceed/review/reject)
steps.expectedOutcome: Structured screening report for hiring manager
